titleInfo.title: Drawing of Harrison Avenue in Leadville, Colorado

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''Leadville - Harrison Ave. Source'' Leadville Hearald [sic] Democrat Jan. 1, 1887.'' Stamped on back: ''If reproduced use credit line: Denver Public Library Western Collection Photo by.''

mods.abstract: Artist's rendering of Harrison Avenue in Leadville, Colorado. This image originally appeared in the Leadville Herald Democrat. Buildings such as the Tabor Opera House, Clarenoon Hotel and others are depicted along both sides of the street.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
